sourcesContent: import { useEffect, useState } from "react" export default function AddNewProduct() { const [thumnail, setThumnail] = useState(false) const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]) const [name, setName] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const [unitPrice, setUnitPrice] = useState(0) const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0) const [additionalInfo, setAdditionalInfo] = useState('') useEffect(() => { fetch('/api/getCategories') .then(res => res.json()) .then(categories => setCategories(categories)) }, []) function handleChange(event) { console.log(event.target.name) } function handleUpload(event) { setThumnail(URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0])) } function handleAddNewProduct() { } return (
